Translations.Text: Who Unu iniciat creation est tiam ripet gxi? Who Unu est proviz por vi heaven ter? est gxi another di DI? Dir Montr me your proof se vi est truthful
Dir Ne 1 heavens ter kon future escept DI! Ili do ne eben perceive kiel when ili resurrected
En fakt, their knowledge Hereafter konfuz. En fakt, ili haven dub gxi. En fakt, ili est totally heedless thereof
Those disbelieved dir ni turn into polv ankaux our parents ni get brought out
Ni don sam promes en des preter. These est nothing tales el preter
Dir Roam ter not consequences kulp
Ne grieve them ne annoyed their scheming
Ili dir When promes ven pas vi est truthful
dir Vi jam sufer kelk da retribution vi challenge
Your Lord est plen da grace popol plej de them est unappreciative
Your Lord fully kon ki their kest kasx ki ili deklar
(tie est nothing heavens ter kasx Di;) cxio est profound record
This Quran sald many issues Infan Israel; issues ti ili ankoraux disput
